metadata.title: CVE-2018-15209 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
ChopUpSingleUncompressedStrip in tif_dirread.c in LibTIFF 4.0.9 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflowand application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via acrafted TIFF file, as demonstrated by tiff2pdf.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-15209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4').
